ISSUE.TITLE: Don't store a currency for the Crawler accounts
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 We should not store currency for Crawler customers (search engines). Always use the default currency for them Many topics on our forums, e.g https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/46884/prevent-change-currency-from-google-crawlers, https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/90983/microdata-currency, https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/90841/googlebot-picking-up-incorrect-currency, etc. Good explanation of the problem and suggestion to fix it here https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/90841/googlebot-picking-up-incorrect-currency#284671
